    Java-API Documentation for core-utils-library of version 21.29.003-SNAPSHOT

    This Java-library contains utility-classes to simplify working with core-java API (streams, collections, input-output).
    Badges & Links
    A link to Release Catalog - the chronological list of all PUBLIC-releases, INTERNAL-releases and SNAPSHOT-version
    A link to this particular version of this project at GitHub
    A link to the test-results that were generated with Open Test Reporting command-line tool, which was executed via maven-exec-plugin's MOJO that is declared in pom.xml-file. That HTML-report is based on XML-report, which is created when JUnit-Platform-properties are enabled.
    A link to the test-coverage report that were generated with JaCoCo Java Code Coverage Library, which was executed via jacoco-maven-plugin.
    Examples of using th-tool to process the directories is demonstrated at simple test site, which is very straight-forward with a lot of duplicated elements, but it's exactly how most of generated sites look like. So, th-tool-tags and expression are inserted before and processed after that third-party site-generator. In our main build-flow that third-party site-generator is a standard javadoc-tool, which comes with every installation of JDK. As for our test site - it's just a demonstration and emulation of some typical cases.
